newsitem.title: ARGENTINA: Caspian Securities opens Buenos Aires brokerage.
newsitem.headline: Caspian Securities opens Buenos Aires brokerage.

text.p: Caspian Securities announced Thursday that its Argentine affiliate, Caspian Securities Sociedad de Bolsa S.A., had started up operations as a local brokerage.

"This event represents Caspian's commitment to providing the highest quality financial services in Argentina, and is part of its overall goal of being the premier investment banking firm in the emerging markets," Caspian said in a press release.
Caspian's research unit already tracks 28 companies listed on the Buenos Aires bolsa, which represent around 88 percent of the market's total capitalization.
The investment bank said since it began operations in December 1995, it has participated in Latin American transactions totaling $2.86 billion.
